resources.string:
Activity Logger is an application that keeps track of the usage of wifi, mobile data and the time of usage of an application. Some of the features of Activity Logger are as follows: 
 
 - Monitor the usage of WiFi by every application 

 - Monitor the usage of Mobile Data by every application 

 - Monitor how long an app has been used by the user 

 - Represent the data in simple user friendly graphical format
- Sugam Shakya\n- Sparsha Dotel \n- Dewesh Rauniyar
